summary: Frontend-only testing completed for Wedding Invitation application with three themes (Floral, Adat, Modern). All major features working correctly including cover section, hero section, couple section with rotating ring animation, events section, Love Story timeline with animated dots and connecting line, countdown boxes, quote section, RSVP form submission, message/ucapan form submission, and gift section.

issues: Cover photo and couple names are visible but some text elements have low opacity/contrast in the initial loading state before animations complete
Countdown shows 00:00:00:00 for past events - expected behavior but could display 'Event has passed' message instead

action_items: Consider adding 'Event has passed' message when countdown reaches zero instead of showing all zeros
Minor: ESLint warnings in InvitationPage.js for missing dependencies in useEffect hooks (lines 64 and 868)
critical_code_review_comments: ESLint warnings: useEffect hooks have missing dependencies (fetchMessages, fetchInvitation) - should add to dependency arrays or use useCallback
Code quality is good overall with proper data-testid attributes for testing
Theme switching works correctly with CSS variables properly applied
seed_data_creation: None - used existing test invitation IDs provided by main agent
context_for_next_testing_agent: All three theme invitation IDs work: Floral (b8a65192-d96d-4369-bfbd-a35bdca93bc5), Adat (ce78313b-e047-458a-9015-9c10af1d4887), Modern (b55b8c01-2452-40a4-a10a-18e9bb861fc5). Base URL: https://ceremony-builder-1.preview.emergentagent.com/undangan/{id}?kpd=Tamu. RSVP and Message forms submit successfully to backend. Love Story timeline has scroll-based animation with dots and connecting line. All themes apply distinct color schemes correctly.

cover_section.notes: Full background with gradient, corner ornaments, floating particles, photo frame with rotating ring, open invitation button

hero_section.notes: Photo frame with decorative ring animation, couple names with script font, date display

couple_section.notes: Rotating ring animation around photos, parent names, Instagram links

events_section.notes: Date display with day/number/month format, time and venue info with icons

love_story_timeline.notes: Animated dots with heart icons, connecting vertical line that grows on scroll, cards alternate left/right on desktop, mobile shows all cards on right with timeline on left

countdown_section.notes: Four animated boxes for days/hours/minutes/seconds, Save to Calendar button

quote_section.notes: Bismillah text, Quran verse with decorative quotes, Surah reference

rsvp_form.notes: Name, phone, attendance radio buttons, guest count (conditional), submit works with success toast

message_form.notes: Name, message textarea, submit works with success toast, messages list displays

gift_section.notes: Bank account cards with copy button functionality

theme_switching.notes: Floral (pink/rose), Adat (brown/gold), Modern (navy/gold) - all apply distinct color schemes via CSS variables

mobile_responsive.notes: Tested on 390x844 viewport, all sections display correctly
